title: Which champ do you guys perma ban?
body:
I personally perma ban

Zoe, The aspect of Satan

replies.body:
{{champion:122}} feels obnoxious to lane against and forces me to have lower CS
{{champion:133}} is ranged with disgusting burst and they always take ignite
{{champion:11}} because he will always AFK farm and even if he fed and is straight up a bad player he'll autowin at a certain point unless you drafted point and click hard cc
{{champion:45}} because his cage is way too impactful in the lategame and his R is disgusting
{{champion:74}} because his damage is abusurdly high and he feels impossible to lane against as a melee
I notice quite a bit of hate for CertainlyT champs here.... I'M NOT ALONE!

{{champion:157}} 
a l w a y s

Used to be akali since no one can ever handle her if shes on the enemy team.

Now its Quinn.

{{champion:27}} 
He's just really annoying to play against

{{champion:122}} to be honest. I can't really survive in lane against him and somehow every jungler loves to camp their own Darius. It's just nasty to play against even though I acknowledge that the issue doesn't lie with Darius so much as it does with me.

I have once forgot to ban {{champion:142}} and she slipped through the cracks.

Kinda sad I'd like to think about the meta and do efficient bans and all that jazz, but from now until forever she will not step even once on the rift if I have the say on the matter.
